snippet.title: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart – Accolades Trailer I PS5
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/ratchet-and-clank-rift-apart/?emcid=or-1s-412983

Ratchet and Clank are back! Help them take on Dr. Nefarious and his new empire by battling hordes of robotic troopers in a cataclysmic expedition across dimensions. Witness the evolution of the dream team as they’re joined by Rivet – a Lombax resistance fighter from another dimension. Enjoy a dazzling interdimensional adventure fueled by the mind-blowing speed and immersive features of the PlayStation®5 console. Built from the ground up by acclaimed studio Insomniac Games, you’ll go beyond what you see with in-game actions coming to life in your hands via the DualSense™ wireless controller.

Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart is available now, exclusively on the PlayStation®5 Console.
